DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Bone Loss Women Who Take Calcium Vitamin D With Women Who Also Take Risedronate Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control trial ( RCT ) compare change 12 month bone structure , bone mineral density ( BMD ) , bone turnover woman low bone mass within 5 year menopause . Women randomize one control 2 treatment group ( n =103 per group ) : 1 ) optimal calcium + vitamin D ( optimal CaD ) alone ( Control ) ; 2 ) Bisphosphonate ( BP ) plus optimal CaD ( Risedronate ) ; 3 ) bone load exercise program plus optimal CaD ( Exercise ) . Our central hypothesis improvement bone health great subject randomize exercise group compare subject either control risedronate group . Specific Aims : Aims 1 , 2 , 3 compare control , risedronate , exercise group subject change bone structure tibia hip ( measure pQCT Hip Structural Analysis ) ( Aim 1 ) ; change BMD total hip , femoral neck , spine ( Aim 2 ) ; change serum marker bone formation resorption ( Aim 3 ) . In addition , Aim 4 explore relationship adherence exercise ( % session attend ) adherence risedronate ( % pills take ) change bone structure .
DOC.criteria: Women first 5 year menopause Have T score 1 2.49 femoral neck , total hip , L1L4 spine Be 19 year age old Have health care provider 's permission enroll study . Have osteoporosis Have 10 yr probability hip fracture > 3 % major fracture > 20 % base result FRAX tool Currently take bisphosphonates , estrogen replacement therapy , glucocorticosteroids , drug affect bone Currently participate resistance training high impact weight bear exercise program two time weekly Weigh > 300 lb Have abnormal result follow laboratory test : serum 25 ( OH ) D ; serum creatinine ; serum calcium ; PTH ; TSH Have Paget 's disease , heart disease , uncontrolled hypertension , renal disease , concomitant condition prohibit participation exercise , risedronate therapy , use CaD supplement .
